title: Creative Watchface LITE
summary: Creative watchface LITE is a FREE and easy to use watch face designed for you.

This can help you fastest way to simplify your watches' UI in few seconds.- Whole new watchface wallpapers for Android Wear are released today by SAStudio with more simple features to customize your watch:Key features:• Light and Beautiful wallpapers  view for your watches.• Brand new Dynamic & static wallpapers are updated frequently.• Very low battery usage to keep your SmartWatch alive whole day!•Best performance to keep your watch battery a life after days.•Well designed watch with classic & modern to fit with all Android Wear screen.•Easily to manage all of Font & Wallpapers with launcher.•Simply to customize your UI in few seconds with our suggested Pre - Build tab.Let download all of FREE wallpapers for your smartwatch.Enjoys!!!Requires Android Wear - supports the following watches :✔ Motorola Moto 360✔ Motorola Moto 360 Gen 2✔ Asus ZenWatch✔ Asus ZenWatch 2✔ Huawei Watch✔ LG G Watch✔ LG G Watch R✔ LG Watch Urbane✔ Samsung Gear Live✔ Sony SmartWatch 3✔ TAG Heuer Connect✔ Fossil Q FOUNDER• And more compatible watches in next version.With more NEW COOL FEATURES are coming in next updates.Any suggestion or bug or just a punch, please email to : sa.studio1702@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
- Creative watchface LITE is a FREE and very easy to use digital watch face designed for Android Wear. It has simple settings to help you easily customize your watches with few touches. This can help you fastest way to simplify your watches' UI in few seconds.

- Whole new watchface wallpapers for Android Wear are released today by SAStudio with more simple features to customize your watch:

Key features:

• Light and Beautiful wallpapers view for your watches.

• Brand new Dynamic & static wallpapers are updated frequently.

• Very low battery usage to keep your SmartWatch alive whole day!

•Best performance to keep your watch battery a life after days.

•Well designed watch with classic & modern to fit with all Android Wear screen.

•Easily to manage all of Font & Wallpapers with launcher.

•Simply to customize your UI in few seconds with our suggested Pre - Build tab.


Let download all of FREE wallpapers for your smartwatch.

Enjoys!!!

Requires Android Wear - supports the following watches :
✔ Motorola Moto 360
✔ Motorola Moto 360 Gen 2
✔ Asus ZenWatch
✔ Asus ZenWatch 2
✔ Huawei Watch
✔ LG G Watch
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ LG Watch Urbane
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Sony SmartWatch 3
✔ TAG Heuer Connect
✔ Fossil Q FOUNDER

• And more compatible watches in next version.
With more NEW COOL FEATURES are coming in next updates.
Any suggestion or bug or just a punch, please email to : sa.studio1702@gmail.com
recentChanges: **** Fixed connection and some minor bugs.
